edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap
Class ProtegeProjectGroup

java.lang.Object
  edu.uchsc.ccp.dmap.ProtegeProjectGroup

public class ProtegeProjectGroup
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a collection of Protege Knowledge Bases that are being used together in the OpenDMAP parser.

This class maintains a list of "isa" associations between these projects so that the parser can make "isa" inferences across project boundaries.

Author:
R. James FIrby

public void addIsaRelationship(edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame a,
                               edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame b)
Add a new relationship that says that frame a is a child of frame b. These frames can be in different knowledge bases.

Parameters:
a - The child frame
b - The parent frame

getFrameByName

public edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame getFrameByName(java.lang.String name)
Get a protege frame with the given name from one of the projects in this group. If there are frames with this name in multiple knowledge bases, just take the first one.

Parameters:
name - The name of the frame to be found
Returns:
The frame

isa

public boolean isa(edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame a,
                   edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame b)
Check whether one Protege Frame is the ancestor of another. Follow associations across knowledge base boundaries.

Parameters:
a - The frame to check
b - The possible ancestor
Returns:
True if b is an ancestor of a

allAbstractions

public java.util.Collection<edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame> allAbstractions(edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame frame)
Get all of the abstractions of a Protege Frame. The abstractions are all of its superclasses, including those across Protege knowledge base boundaries.

Parameters:
frame - The frame
Returns:
All of its superclasses

allInstances

public java.util.Collection<edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame> allInstances(edu.stanford.smi.protege.model.Frame frame)
Find all of the instances of a Protege Frame including those in other KBs if appropriate associations exist.

Parameters:
frame - The frame
Returns:
All simple instances of the frame
